Package edu.teddys.timer

Class Summary
ChecksumManager  
ChecksumManagerThread  
ClientTimer The ClientTimer sends a dump of the current keyboard and mouse state in the same interval as the server parses the events (see GameSettings.SERVER_TIMESTAMP_INTERVAL).
ClientTimerThread  
ServerDataSync Triggers a network message to sync the current server data.
ServerDataSyncThread  
ServerTimer The ServerTimer does the whole logic of a game with registered players.
ServerTimerThread
